segments.text: I need to know why I'm being charged $ 10 for a movie that I never ordered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . Your file shows that you watched ' Titanic ' Monday night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Monday night ? Monday night I was at a great concert .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , as they say , garbage in , garbage out . Let me correct this error , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . It's very nice when problems can be solved quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I deleted the $ 10 , the computer automatically added a $ 2 service charge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you crazy ? You made the mistake and now you're charging me for your mistake ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , if it makes you feel any better , the $ 2 service fee used to be $ 5 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you just stick a gun in my ribs and take everything I have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , sir , you'll have to pay the $ 2 , whether you like it or not .
segments.speaker: S2
